Resolver validates attestation (identity, action, etc.) 2. Resolver calls greenGoodsResolver.onWorkApproved() / onAssessmentCreated() 3. Resolver iterates enabled modules with try/catch 4. Attestation succeeds regardless of module outcomes","kind":"dev","methods":{"isModuleEnabled(bytes32)":{"params":{"moduleId":"The module identifier (e.g., keccak256(\"GAP\"),
